name: Grow As You Go
description:
Welcome to Grow As You Go, a Laser and Feelings hack about houseplants!

It's not easy being a neglected houseplant. Your Owner is always either giving you too much or too little water, they don't fertilize you enough, they placed you on a shady bookcase when your label clearly indicated your need for direct sunlight! But you've heard of a mystical place: the Neighbor's place. They're much better at caring for plants than the Owner is. If you can make it to the Neighbor's, you'll get a much higher standard of care . . . but you didn't think it'd be THAT easy, did you? Get around obstacles and battle malevolent forces as you travel to your new home with your other plant friends!

Grow As You Go is a Lasers and Feelings hack. Lasers and Feelings is licensed under a CC BY 4.0 license by John Harper.
